parameters.responseBody:
403

Access denied

Token Is Invalid.

parameters.query:
WITH u AS (
  SELECT email, role
  FROM users
  WHERE token = $1
    AND active = true
    AND token_expires_at > NOW()
  LIMIT 1
),
slide AS (
  UPDATE users
  SET token_expires_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '30 minutes'
  WHERE token = $1
    AND active = true
    AND token_expires_at > NOW()
    AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM u)
  RETURNING 1
)
SELECT
  $1 AS token,
  (u.email IS NOT NULL) AS token_valid,
  COALESCE(u.email, '') AS email,
  COALESCE(u.role, '') AS role
FROM (SELECT 1) dummy
LEFT JOIN u ON true
LIMIT 1;

WITH u AS (
  SELECT role, email, name
  FROM users
  WHERE token = $1
    AND active = true
    AND token_expires_at > NOW()
  LIMIT 1
),
slide AS (
  UPDATE users
  SET token_expires_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '30 minutes'
  WHERE token = $1
    AND active = true
    AND token_expires_at > NOW()
    AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM u)
  RETURNING 1
)
SELECT
  $1 AS token,
  (u.email IS NOT NULL) AS token_valid,
  COALESCE(u.role, '') AS role,
  COALESCE(u.email, '') AS email,
  COALESCE(u.name, '') AS name
FROM (SELECT 1) dummy
LEFT JOIN u ON true
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  COALESCE(
    json_agg(
      json_build_object(
        'claim_id', c.claim_id,
        'submitted_at', c.submitted_at,
        'employee_email', c.employee_email,
        'employee_name', c.employee_name,
        'category', c.category,
        'amount', c.amount,
        'currency', c.currency,
        'merchant', c.merchant,
        'description', c.description,
        'receipt_url', c.receipt_url,
        'status', c.status,
        'approver_email', c.approver_email,
        'approved_at', c.approved_at,
        'decision_notes', c.decision_notes
      )
      ORDER BY c.submitted_at DESC
    ) FILTER (WHERE c.claim_id IS NOT NULL),
    '[]'::json
  ) AS claims
FROM claims c
WHERE c.approver_email = $1;
